about_the_game:
In the future, America is a contaminated wasteland with more
than 500 million people living in dence, populated cities.
Political scandals, high crime rate and slums.

A soldier in an unjust World, against swat and agents.



ABOUT GAMEPLAY:

-Maps can only be played in order, one after the other.
-After killing enemy you will get Credits.
-You have unlimited ammunition, but every shot cost GAME CURRENCY (Credits).
-Player has two weapon slots.
-You can not change weapon slot 1 after collect the first weapon, only the second slot can be changed.



HINT:

YOU CAN SET UP YOUR OWN PERSONAL INPUTS UNDER OPTION

content_descriptors.notes: This is an action game in which player equip hisself with different weapons and kill human enemies. Large blood-splatter effects occur as enemies are killed.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/10 64-bit
  • Processor: Core i5-7200 or AMD Ryzen 5 1600X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 760 or Radeon HD 7950
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/10 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen™ 5 2600 (Intel i7-4770)
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ RX 590 or NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2500 MB available space
